medium: Red earthenware with molded and sculpted decoration under white slip; painted with cold pigments
title: Striding Horse
description:
standing white horse with red mane; white bridle; red white and brown cloth-covered saddle; diamond pattern on saddle cover; horse wears chest piece
with shells and decorative trappings on backside; hair on mane between ears pulled into a vertical horn-like tail; a notch in each ear
creditline: Lent by David and Flinnina Dewey
